message: Starting critique - gathering phase handover and agent findings
Examining completed agent findings and work products
Reading real_mcp_server.py to verify agent's work and assess quality
Formulating senior developer critique based on findings and code review

Critique completed - Submitted 6 observations covering praise, concerns, architectural issues, and suggestions. Key finding: review system needs complexity-based gating to avoid massive overhead on trivial tasks. Agent's work was accurate but spawning 3 review agents for a 30-second file check is inefficient.
